instrumentation: soprano, alto, tenor, bass, choir (SATB), 3 trumpets, timpani, 3 oboes, oboe d'amore, bassoon, 2 violins, viola, basso continuo
notes: Originally composed in 1723 (BWV 69a). Reworked in 1748 for the inauguration of a town council, with changes to recitatives and chorale.

movements.title: Wie groß ist Gottes Güte doch
Der Herr hat große Ding an uns getan
Es danke, Gott, und lobe dich
